pivotParameters.http-expand-vt-url$$$jq: ({url: "{url}", source: "VirusTotal"}) as $root   | ({}) as $nodes   | ({scan_id:  .scan_id, resource: .resource, response_code: .response_code, scan_date: .scan_date, permalink: .permalink, verbose_msg: .verbose_msg, filescan_id: .filescan_id, positives: .positives, total: .total}) as $attrs   | ([.scans[] | . + $root + {field: "scans"}])  + [$attrs + $nodes + $root]
